EmailTemplate.name: External Newsletter.2019-03-07
EmailTemplate.subject: Spring Cloud Data Flow 2.0 is Now GA
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
March 7, 2019 <[[https://content.pivotal.io/blog/spring-cloud-data-flow-2-0-at-a-multi-platform-enterprise?utm_source=pivotal-newsletter&utm_medium=email-link&utm_campaign=external-newsletter]]> Spring Cloud Data Flow 2.0 is Now GA We're excited to announce the general availability of Spring Cloud Data Flow 2.0. Learn about this new update and what it can do for you. Learn More <[[https://content.pivotal.io/blog/spring-cloud-data-flow-2-0-at-a-multi-platform-enterprise?utm_source=pivotal-newsletter&utm_medium=email-link&utm_campaign=external-newsletter]]> <[[https://content.pivotal.io/intersect/duke-energy-is-using-data-to-validate-corporate-strategy-you-can-too?utm_source=pivotal-newsletter&utm_medium=email-link&utm_campaign=external-newsletter]]> Duke Energy is Using Data to Validate Corporate Strategies. You Can, Too. Learn how Duke Energy is transforming their corporate culture and approach to software. Read More <[[https://content.pivotal.io/intersect/duke-energy-is-using-data-to-validate-corporate-strategy-you-can-too?utm_source=pivotal-newsletter&utm_medium=email-link&utm_campaign=external-newsletter]]> <[[https://content.pivotal.io/blog/my-devops-reading-list?utm_source=pivotal-newsletter&utm_medium=email-link&utm_campaign=external-newsletter]]> Dive Deep Into DevOps With This Reading List Continuous learning is key to the success of any technology professional and when it comes to DevOps, it's no different. Shaun Norris compiled a reading list to jump-start your knowledge. Dev-Ops Must-Reads <[[https://content.pivotal.io/blog/my-devops-reading-list?utm_source=pivotal-newsletter&utm_medium=email-link&utm_campaign=external-newsletter]]> <[[https://pivotal.io/intersect?utm_source=pivotal-newsletter&utm_medium=email-link&utm_campaign=external-newsletter]]> <https://content.pivotal.io/podcasts/the-enterprise-event-loop-multi-cloud-more-with-james-urquhart?utm_source=pivotal-newsletter&utm_medium=email-link&utm_campaign=external-newsletter> The Enterprise Event Loop, Multi-Cloud, and More, with James Urquhart In this episode of Pivotal Conversations, Coté and Richard talk to James Urquhart about architectural ideas for converting the enterprise over to an event-driven flow, the reasons for doing multi-cloud, and what kinds of conversations "executives" find helpful. Listen In <[[https://content.pivotal.io/podcasts/the-enterprise-event-loop-multi-cloud-more-with-james-urquhart?utm_source=pivotal-newsletter&utm_medium=email-link&utm_campaign=external-newsletter]]> <[[https://content.pivotal.io/blog/check-out-the-power-of-ci-and-pipelines?utm_source=pivotal-newsletter&utm_medium=email-link&utm_campaign=external-newsletter]]> The Power of CI and Pipelines Dan Baskette explains why there is power in continuous integration and pipelines. Take a Closer Look <[[https://content.pivotal.io/blog/check-out-the-power-of-ci-and-pipelines?utm_source=pivotal-newsletter&utm_medium=email-link&utm_campaign=external-newsletter]]> <[[https://content.pivotal.io/analyst-reports/ceos-foster-the-software-teams-and-talents-your-firm-needs?utm_source=pivotal-newsletter&utm_medium=email-link&utm_campaign=external-newsletter]]> Foster The Software Teams And Talents Your Firm Needs Because software fuels digital transformation, poor software capability is now a barrier to CEOs' success. Learn why reason it's necessary for CEOs to engage with software leaders to ensure that they align and progress in this Forrester report. Dig Deeper <[[https://content.pivotal.io/analyst-reports/ceos-foster-the-software-teams-and-talents-your-firm-needs?utm_source=pivotal-newsletter&utm_medium=email-link&utm_campaign=external-newsletter]]> <https://content.pivotal.io/net-and-the-return-of-windows?utm_source=pivotal-newsletter&utm_medium=email-link&utm_campaign=external-newsletter> .NET and The Return of Windows How .NET developers and Windows sysadmins are modernizing with cloud-native patterns. Check it Out <[[https://content.pivotal.io/net-and-the-return-of-windows?utm_source=pivotal-newsletter&utm_medium=email-link&utm_campaign=external-newsletter]]> Upcoming Events 3/18-3/22, Greenplum Summit at Postgres Conf, New York <[[ https://pivotal.io/event/greenplum-summit]]>
3/28, Executive Roundtable & Dinner with Cognizant, Dell EMC, and Pivotal, New York <[[https://dell.captix.com/event/MZMVUx/register/]]>
4/02-4/04, Cloud Foundry Summit North America, Philadelphia <[[https://www.cloudfoundry.org/event/nasummit2019/]]>
Check Out Upcoming Pivotal Events <[[http://info.pivotal.io/UPBY0aJ0NU0ICz02nA030DG]]>
